title: First Watch Careers: Why the "Daytime Only" Model is the Future of Restaurant Facilities Management

hero_image.alt: Hero image for First Watch Careers: Why the "Daytime Only" Model is the Future of Restaurant Facilities Management

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, wide-angle shot of a modern, bright commercial kitchen during the afternoon "golden hour" maintenance window. In the foreground, a diverse male maintenance technician wearing a branded polo shirt, safety glasses, and a tool belt is kneeling to inspect the control panel of a stainless steel commercial refrigeration unit. He is using a multimeter. In the background, a female facilities manager in business casual attire and a hard hat is holding a tablet (back of device visible only), gesturing toward an HVAC vent in the ceiling, discussing with a contractor. The kitchen is clean, stainless steel gleams, and sunlight streams in through large windows, emphasizing the "daytime" aspect. No text or logos in the image. Professional lighting, high resolution.
